original_text: And Elisha came again to Gilgal: and there was a dearth in the land; and the sons of the prophets were sitting before him: and he said unto his servant, Set on the great pot, and seethe pottage for the sons of the prophets.
korean_text: 엘리사가 다시 길갈에 이르니 그 땅에 흉년이 들었는데 선지자의 제자들이 엘리사의 앞에 앉은지라 엘리사가 자기 사환에게 이르되 큰 솥을 걸고 선지자의 제자들을 위하여 국을 끓이라 하매

sentences.original_text: And Elisha came again to Gilgal
and there was a dearth in the land
and sons of the prophets were sitting before him
sentences.korean_translation: 선지자의 아들들이 그의 앞에 앉아 있더라

sentences.original_text: and he said unto his servant
and seethe pottage for the sons of the prophets
